item.description: 8 Great Dates in one Fun Night! Margarita's provides free appetizers, and great atmosphere for our group. Please register in advance at www.8minuteDating.com use coupon code 8mdelaines19899 to receive $8. discount Guaranteed to meet someone you want to meet again or your next event is free! Call or email Elaine for further information 603 262 1560
item.name: Speed Dating for Baby Boomers at Margarita's in Nashua
